backend/main.mo: Main backend actor implementing access control, user profiles, and extensive resident clinical data types with basic profile read/write APIs.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module defining old and new resident/medication schemas and data transformation logic for upgrades.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping PRN‑related medication UI features to their corresponding frontend files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Collection of autogenerated summaries describing key frontend components, pages, hooks, and styling files.
frontend/docs/release/promote-v22-to-pro: Documentation for promoting Draft Version 22 to production using existing build artifacts with no code changes.
frontend/docs/release/promote-v27-to-pro: Documentation for promoting Draft Version 27 to production as a release‑only update preserving all backend state.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base/setup plus CSS variables defining light and dark theme colors and layout tokens.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading the favicon, root div, and main TypeScript bundle.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main application boot logic handling authentication, actor creation, profile fetching, routing, and deployment toasts.
frontend/src/components/adl/ADLTab.tsx: Displays a resident’s ADL records in a table and provides a modal to add new records if permitted.
frontend/src/components/adl/modals/AddAD: Modal form for creating a new ADL record with fields for date, activity, assistance level, and notes.
frontend/src/components/auth/AccessDenie: UI screen showing an access denied message with navigation back to the dashboard.
frontend/src/components/auth/BootErrorSc: Error screen for failed actor/profile initialization with retry, logout, and diagnostic details.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Modal prompting new users to enter name, role, and optional related resident IDs, then save their profile.
frontend/src/components/branding/Logo.ts: Renders the app logo with size variants for headers, login screens, icons, and small displays.
Defines the main layout with login handling, authentication actions, and shared header/footer UI.
frontend/src/components/mar/MARTab.tsx: Displays a resident’s MAR records with medication names and allows adding new records when permitted.
frontend/src/components/mar/modals/AddMA: Modal form for creating a new MAR record with medication selection, time, staff, and notes.
frontend/src/components/medications/Medi: Renders active and discontinued medications with physician info and edit/discontinue controls.
Shows a resident’s medications with details and provides add, edit, and discontinue actions.
frontend/src/components/medications/moda: Modal form to add a medication, including dosage, route, times, physician, notes, and PRN options.
Modal form for editing an existing medication, managing PRN logic, administration times, and submitting updates via useUpdateMedication.
frontend/src/components/residents/CodeSt: Displays a resident's code status as a styled badge, switching appearance between DNR and Full Code.
frontend/src/components/residents/modals: Modal for creating a new resident with fields for personal info, physicians, contacts, pharmacy, insurance, and medications.
Modal for updating resident information, including demographics, physicians, pharmacy data, and code status.
frontend/src/components/residents/Reside: Generates a printable resident profile report including demographics, physicians, meds, and other details.
frontend/src/components/vitals/DailyVita: Displays a table of recorded daily vitals for a resident and provides a button to add new entries.
frontend/src/components/vitals/modals/Re: Modal for entering and submitting a new set of daily vital signs for a resident.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates a backend actor tied to the user's identity and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth state, loading stored identities, and login/logout functionality via context.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for user profiles, residents, permissions, and related actor-backed data operations.
frontend/src/hooks/useResilientActor.ts: Initializes a fault-tolerant backend actor with retry logic and invalidates dependent queries when ready.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind-based global styles with OKLCH theme variables and print-specific formatting rules.
frontend/src/lib/auth/helpers.ts: Contains user permission helpers for staff/admin checks, resident access, and user type labeling.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the app with React Query and Internet Identity providers and renders the main App component.
frontend/src/pages/ResidentDashboardPage: UI page displaying resident lists, search/filter controls, and basic resident statistics using data hooks.
frontend/src/pages/ResidentProfilePage.t: React page showing a resident profile with tabs, medication management modals, and print support.
frontend/src/utils/dateOnly.ts: Utility functions for parsing YYYY-MM-DD dates and computing timezone‑safe age values.
frontend/src/utils/errorDiagnostics.ts: Normalizes unknown errors into structured diagnostics and formats them for display.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Helpers for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters using query strings and sessionStorage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom colors, container settings, animations, and plugins.
project_state.json: Project metadata tracking PRN medication feature requirements and current implementation state.
